title: HPE security advisory (AV25-427)
description: On July 16, 2025, HPE published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: HPE Telco Service Orchestrator  versions prior to v5.2.1
HPE Cray XD670  version prior to TPM Firmware v7.86
HPE Cray XD675  version prior to TPM Firmware v15.24
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
